title: H. Alternating case
statement: You are given a string consisting of alphabet letters. Convert it to alternating case: the letters on odd positions should be in uppercase, and the letters on even positions should be lowercase. The letters are numbered staring from 1.
inputSpecification: The only line of input contains a string between 1 and 100 characters long. Each character of the string is either an uppercase ('A'-'Z') or a lowercase ('a'-'z') letter.
name: Alternating case
